title: IONOS: Why the pandemic has put digitalization firmly in the spotlight
author: techradar-pro
summary: IONOS talks all things digitalization and rapid website building uptake caused by COVID
article: Modern SMBs are quickly learning the benefits of getting online, with service providers such as European cloud and hosting giant IONOS taking full advantage of this demand.

Long gone are the days where a small business might struggle to grow its online presence, as tools such as website builders and web hosting providers streamline their efforts in building ready-made packages tailored to gain maximum online exposure.

Patrick Schaudel, Head of Online Applications SME, IONOS, spoke to TechRadar Pro about what the company has been up to during the last six months, and tells us what the company has in store for its future offerings and services.
